Dashboard Ui generic

Source: R/dashboard.R, R/dock.R
dashboard.Rd

Dashboard Ui generic

Dashboard grid server

Dashboard dock UI method

Dashboard dock server method

Usage

dashboard_ui(id, board, ...)

dashboard_server(board, update, session, parent, ...)

# S3 method for class 'dag_board'
dashboard_ui(id, board, ...)

# S3 method for class 'dag_board'
dashboard_server(board, update, session, parent, ...)

Arguments

id

Module id.

board

Board reactiveValues. Read-only.

...

Extra parameters.

update

Update reactiveVal to signal change to the board.

session

Shiny session.

parent

Parent global reactiveValues.
